# some plots

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
```

```{r}
noaa_df = ny_noaa|>
   separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-")|>
  mutate(
    tmax = (as.numeric(tmax))/10,
    tmin = (as.numeric(tmin))/10
  )
```

```{r}
noaa_df |>
  group_by(id, year) |>  
  summarize(total_prcp = sum(prcp)) |>
  ungroup()|>
  ggplot( aes(x = year, y = total_prcp)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    title = "Average Temperature Range by year",
    x = "ID",
    y = "Average Temperature Range (Â°C)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
noaa_df|> 
  filter(snow > 0, snow < 100) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = snow, y = factor(year))) +
  geom_density_ridges() +
  labs(
    title = "Disribution of snow by year"
  )
```
